content.query:
-- ==============================================================================
-- Vistas de la capa Gold para el informe
-- ==============================================================================

-- CREATE OR ALTER VIEW fact.Sales AS 
-- SELECT *
-- FROM gold.dbo.fact_Sales

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Articles AS
SELECT  skarticles, 
        idarticles, 
        name, 
        description, 
        externalCode, 
        size, 
        numSize, 
        colour, 
        category, 
        codLine, 
        line, 
        season
FROM gold.dbo.dim_articles

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Client AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_client

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Currency AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_currency

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Date AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_date

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Hours AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_hours

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.OperationType AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_operationtype

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.PostalCode AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_postalcode

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Tariff AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_tariff

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dim.Warehouse AS
SELECT *
FROM gold.dbo.dim_warehouse
